name: Geo Infusion
description: The character to which this is attached has their Normal Attacks deal +1 DMG, and their Physical DMG dealt converted to Geo DMG.
descriptionraw: The character to which this is attached has their <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attacks</color> deal +1 DMG, and their $[K100] dealt converted to $[K106].
descriptionreplaced: The character to which this is attached has their <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attacks</color> deal +1 DMG, and their {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color> dealt converted to {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>.
